sourcesContent:
<!-- ----Weather2.vue-------------------------2021-01-03----- -->
<template>
  <svg width="100%" viewBox="-50 -50 200 275">
    <rect class="w2Background" x="-50" y="-50" width="250" height="325" />
    <CiWeather :x="0*dx" :y="1*dy" sid="wetter1" :border="0"></CiWeather>
    <CiWeather :x="1*dx" :y="1*dy" sid="wetter2" :border="0"></CiWeather>
    <CiWeather :x="0*dx" :y="0*dy" sid="wetter6" :border="0"></CiWeather>
    <CiWeather :x="1*dx" :y="0*dy" sid="wetter8" :border="0"></CiWeather>
<!--
    <text class="w2Font1" :x="-4" :y="185">21:34</text>
-->
    <text class="w2Font1" :x="-35" :y="180">{{ timeHMS }}</text>
    <text class="w2Font1" :x="dxDate" :y="220">{{ dateDM }} </text>

  </svg>
</template>

<script lang="ts">
import { defineComponent } from 'vue'
import { Geo } from '@/components/CiBase.vue'
import CiWeather from '@/components/CiWeather.vue'

export default defineComponent({
  name: 'Weather2',
  components: {
    CiWeather
  },
  data: function () {
    return {
      intervalHandle: null as any,
      timeHMS: new Date().toLocaleTimeString(),
      dateDM: this.fDateDM()
    }
  },
  computed: {
    geo: function (): Geo {
      const geo1 = new Geo(0, 0)
      return geo1
    },
    dx: function (): number { return (this.geo.dxo) },
    dy: function (): number { return (this.geo.dyo) },
    dxDate: function (): number {
      const len1 = this.fDateDM().length
      if (len1 === 7) return -25
      if (len1 === 8) return -35
      return (-45)
    }
  },
  mounted: function (): void {
    this.intervalHandle = setInterval(() => {
      this.timeHMS = new Date().toLocaleTimeString()
      this.dateDM = this.fDateDM()
    }, 1000)
  },
  unmounted: function (): void {
    clearInterval(this.intervalHandle)
  },
  methods: {
    fDateDM: function (): string {
      const wochentag = ['SO', 'MO', 'DI', 'MI', 'DO', 'FR', 'SA']
      // const s1 = 'MO 14.02.'
      const now = new Date()
      const s1 = wochentag[now.getDay()] + ' ' + now.getDate() + '.' + (now.getMonth() + 1) + '.'
      // s1 = wochentag[now.getDay()] + s1
      return s1
    },
    showErdgeschoss: function () {
      console.log('CLICK - showErdgeschoss', '')
      this.$router.push({ name: 'Erdgeschoss' })
    }
  }
})
</script>

<style scoped>
.w2Background {fill: blue; }
.w2Font1 { font-size: 36px; font-weight: bold; fill: yellow; color: lightgreen; font-family: "DejaVu Sans Mono","monospace"; white-space: pre; }
</style>
